page.title: 15Gauldry Youth Club
page.content: Our Youth Club is held in the Morison Duncan Hall and in the hut which used to be a working men's hut.Both these buildings are adjacent to the village school. The facilities include 10 five foot snooker tables,a dart board,a record player,settee and armchairs and tuck shop. The club has about 50 members.There is a Junior section which runs from 18:30 to 20:00 and a Senior section from 20:00 to 22:00 each Thursday. The leader is Mrs.Cora Stevenson.Recently the club visited Lochore Meadows for a fun day.Most people liked the orienteering best.During the year there have been golf competitions,pool championships, draughts championships,Baker of the year awards,Art and Craft competitions and fund raising for Ethiopia.
